refnamediv.refpurpose: Specifies an alternate name for endnotes list

refsection.para: If the value of the man.endnotes.are.numbered parameter and/or the man.endnotes.list.enabled parameter is non-zero (the defaults for both are non-zero), a numbered list of endnotes is generated near the end of each man page. The default heading for the list of endnotes is the equivalent of the English word NOTES in the current locale. To cause an alternate heading to be displayed, set a non-empty value for the man.endnotes.list.heading parameter â€” for example, REFERENCES.
